properties.Title: CDB, China Eximbank, ICBC, and Bank of China provide $5.988 billion syndicated loan to repay debts and meet capital requirements of Las Bambas Copper Project (Linked to Project ID#55427)
properties.Funding Agencies: Bank of China (BOC)|China Development Bank (CDB)|Export-Import Bank of China|Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC)
properties.Receiving Agencies: Minera Las Bambas S.A.C. (Minera Las Bambas)
properties.Implementing Agencies: Minera Las Bambas S.A.C. (Minera Las Bambas)
